name: trackiellm
description: vcpkg manifest for TrackieLLM C/C++ dependencies.

dependencies.name: onnxruntime
dependencies.description: Core dependency for running computer vision models (YOLO, MiDaS).

dependencies.name: libsodium
dependencies.description: Modern and easy-to-use crypto library for security features.

dependencies.name: protobuf
dependencies.description: Protocol Buffers, often a dependency for ML model serialization and communication.

tests.description: Dependencies for building unit and integration tests.

dependencies.name: gtest
dependencies.description: GoogleTest framework for C++ unit testing.

dependencies.name: google-benchmark
dependencies.description: Google Benchmark library for performance microbenchmarks.
